title: Mentoring Program for Strengthening Teaching Competencies in Online Course Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in online course management and understanding of pedagogical theories
context.additional_context: Mentors and mentees collaborate 1:1 or in small groups, focusing on improving individual learnersâ€™ lecture content.

learning_goals: Through mentoring, learners can apply at least three strategies to promote learner engagement when designing online courses.
Based on feedback received from peer teachers via peer review, learners can improve their instructional materials by over 80%.
Learners can develop at least one online course module by applying educational design principles (e.g., backward design).

resources: Online course development guidelines for instructors

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
